scripts.start:webpack: pnpm --filter native-federation-tests-typescript-remote dev:webpack & wait-on http-get://localhost:3000/ && pnpm --filter native-federation-tests-typescript-host dev:webpack
scripts.start:rspack: pnpm --filter native-federation-tests-typescript-remote dev:rspack & wait-on http-get://localhost:3000/ && pnpm --filter native-federation-tests-typescript-host dev:rspack
